title: Reincarnation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/18/21
itunes:title: Reincarnation - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/18/21
description:
George Noory and author Stephane Allix explore his experience with visions of a German soldier killed in combat during World War II, how he believes he could be a reincarnation of the dead soldier, and how he comforted the dead spirit to help it finally find forgiveness and healing.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
